Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 29th overall pick, by Texas in 2012...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2012, off Jason Jennings (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/2012, off Barry Zito (OAK)...
Injured on 8/14/2012 with a Sore Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/11/2013 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/20/2014 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (A) on 4/5/2016...
Injured on 7/9/2016 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2017, hitting .560 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Kansas City on 5/5/2017...
Traded from Texas to Tampa Bay on 7/31/2018 (Going to TEX: RF K. Cuyler Jr., LF B. Miller Jr., P M. Price, P M. Scherzer. Going to TB: SS J. Segura, LF T. Crowe)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/17/2018, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2018, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 17 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/27/2020 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Chicago (A) on 9/28/2021...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/12/2023, off Eddie Kunz (LAA)...
